channel.title: Notes on A minimal personal website
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on A minimal personal website

item.title: Another Note on A blogdown Tutorial
item.description: Yihui recommended an awesome tutorial on blogdown written by Alison. I have to admit this is the best blogdown tutorial I have seen so far.

item.title: A Quick Note on Two Beautiful Websites
item.description: Yihui recommended the two most impressive websites based on blogdown are: Rob J Hyndman’s personal website. Live Free or Dichotomize by Lucy and Nick et al. There will be more.
